name: shipstream-captain
description: This Node.js app ('Captain') acts as a public DNS failover orchestrator. It monitors health of services and updates DNS records according to the health of each upstream address. It can run stand-alone or be accompanied by any number of 'Mates' which are used to report remote services and perform remote health checks on those services.

scripts.docker:captain-test: docker compose -f docker-compose-captain-test.yml -p dns-orchestrator-captain-test up --build --remove-orphans --abort-on-container-exit --exit-code-from captain-test-main
scripts.docker:mate-test: docker compose -f docker-compose-mate-test.yml -p dns-orchestrator-captain-test up --build --remove-orphans --abort-on-container-exit --exit-code-from mate-test-main
